# snowmirror_setting (Resource)

Setting Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "snowmirror_setting" "my_setting" {
  options = {
    "corrupti"  = "..."
    "provident" = "..."
  }
  type = "{ \"see\": \"documentation\" }"
}
```
